long_description: Quixote brings together nature's finest goose down fill and a lightweight pillow cover to create an incredibly comfortable down pillow. High-quality Hungarian 650-fill-power goose down is incredibly compressible and maintains great loft retention for maximum comfort. Technically engineered ripstop polyester microfiber cover is durable, lightweight and water resistant; assembled with double needle tailoring and nylon thread. Corner loop lets you hang and store your pillow, keeping it clean and dry. Pillow includes a 100% cotton, 400-thread count pillowcase.
short_description: Quixote brings together nature's finest goose down fill and a lightweight pillow cover to create an incredibly comfortable down pillow.
